message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000. I think you'll find it's a worthwhile investment.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this still reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still unable to meet the price of $17,000. I would like to offer $14,000 for the product. I hope this is within your range.
